bayÈÄrGang,
FROM Barbara Lindberg
DATE
6/16/91
RE: TAT Revised Questionnaire
· I have been out of the office for the past week, so I have just seen the draft of the above. If it is not too late after the fact, t have the. following suggestions and comments,
If we are trying to cover the fact that this will be a cigarette study, why is the page entitled "Viceroy" Projective Test?
balanced.
. The age break off 21 to 55 is extremely broad. While, obviously, a. respondent: has for bur ing
this age group to qualify it would ad dipensions to the analysis to pin-point, his or her age work closely - eng., a 25 year old may resgood differently than a 45 year old.
. Most often brand should also be included for soft drinks and wina for more cover-up,
Projective Tast
I Piotrire
. Bafore channeling the respondent's thinking into specific areas (i.e., place, person, role of algamatte), it might be worthwhile to ask a global question such as: What are your imediata thoughts and feeling? Or, as you firat; looked at this, what went through your mind? etd.
+ Person - The area of personal involvement and TaneIfication should be capped. Finding out whether the respondent likes and respects the model is starting to do it, but should go further e.g., is this someone who could be & good friend of yours or not? In what ways do you think he's like you? Different from you?
.
Further, in probing the model's relationship to his job, we should also cover his degres of commitment to it - is he a hard worker, a. perfectionist, a doer, a thinker, etc. along . the same line, what does his job give him - égo gratification, recognition, status, intellectual challange, etc. ? What are his career aspirations?
In short, probe beyond attitudes toward work in the psychological.
464200444

paragraphs.content: · I have been out of the office for the past week, so I have just seen the draft of the above. If it is not too late after the fact, t have the. following suggestions and comments,
If we are trying to cover the fact that this will be a cigarette study, why is the page entitled "Viceroy" Projective Test?
. The age break off 21 to 55 is extremely broad. While, obviously, a. respondent: has for bur ing
this age group to qualify it would ad dipensions to the analysis to pin-point, his or her age work closely - eng., a 25 year old may resgood differently than a 45 year old.
. Most often brand should also be included for soft drinks and wina for more cover-up,

. Bafore channeling the respondent's thinking into specific areas (i.e., place, person, role of algamatte), it might be worthwhile to ask a global question such as: What are your imediata thoughts and feeling? Or, as you firat; looked at this, what went through your mind? etd.

+ Person - The area of personal involvement and TaneIfication should be capped. Finding out whether the respondent likes and respects the model is starting to do it, but should go further e.g., is this someone who could be & good friend of yours or not? In what ways do you think he's like you? Different from you?

Further, in probing the model's relationship to his job, we should also cover his degres of commitment to it - is he a hard worker, a. perfectionist, a doer, a thinker, etc. along . the same line, what does his job give him - égo gratification, recognition, status, intellectual challange, etc. ? What are his career aspirations?
In short, probe beyond attitudes toward work in the psychological.
